pro test_vgt_stereo_coord ;send to the function - num x and y pixels, center lon and lat, corner coordinates IMAGE = FLTARR(718,718) S = SIZE(IMAGE,/DIMENSIONS) MAPSTRUCT = MAP_PROJ_INIT("POLAR STEREOGRAPHIC", $ CENTER_LONGITUDE=0., CENTER_LATITUDE=-90.) LONGITUDE = [119.176430D, 108.287659, 126.491297, 141.334801] LATITUDE = [-79.332321D, -73.491156, -70.553161, -75.130937] UV = MAP_PROJ_FORWARD(LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, MAP_STRUCTURE=MAPSTRUCT) TIDX = [0,1,3,2] SIDX = [0,1,2,3] U = MAKE_ARRAY(2,2,/DOUBLE) V = MAKE_ARRAY(2,2,/DOUBLE) U[SIDX] = UV[0,TIDX] V[SIDX] = UV[1,TIDX] STOP IX = FINDGEN(718)/717.0 IY = FINDGEN(718)/717.0 UNEW = BILINEAR(U, IX, IY) VNEW = BILINEAR(V, IX, IY) RES = MAP_PROJ_INVERSE(UNEW, VNEW, MAP_STRUCTURE=MAPSTRUCT) NU = REFORM(RES[0,*],S[0],S[1]) NV = REFORM(RES[1,*],S[0],S[1]) STOP END
